original_text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest spoke with them in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho, saying,
korean_text: 모세와 제사장 엘르아살이 여리고 맞은편 요단 가 모압 평지에서 그들에게 전하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: And Moses and Eleazar the priest spoke with them
in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho,
sentences.korean_translation: 요단 강가 여리고 맞은편 모압 평원에서
